Field.Name: name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: Name of the donation record - informational purposes only

Field.Name: firstname
Field.Caption: First Name
Field.HelpDefault: First name of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: lastname
Field.Caption: Last Name
Field.HelpDefault: Last name of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: middlename
Field.Caption: Middle Name
Field.HelpDefault: Middle name of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: address
Field.Caption: Address
Field.HelpDefault: Address of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: address2
Field.Caption: Address 2
Field.HelpDefault: Address 2 of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: city
Field.Caption: City
Field.HelpDefault: City of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: state
Field.Caption: State
Field.HelpDefault: State of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: zip
Field.Caption: Zip
Field.HelpDefault: Zip of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: phone
Field.Caption: Phone
Field.HelpDefault: Phone of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: email
Field.Caption: Email
Field.HelpDefault: Email of the user given during the donation

Field.Name: cardname
Field.Caption: Card Name
Field.HelpDefault: Name on card charged for the donation

Field.Name: cardnumber
Field.Caption: Card Number
Field.HelpDefault: Account number charged for the donation

Field.Name: cardexpiration
Field.Caption: Card Expiration
Field.HelpDefault: Expiration of the card charged for the donation

Field.Name: amount
Field.Caption: Amount
Field.HelpDefault: Amount charged for the donation

Field.Name: cardbillingaddress
Field.Caption: Card Billing Address
Field.HelpDefault: Billing address of the card charged for the donation

Field.Name: cardbillingzip
Field.Caption: Card Billing Zip
Field.HelpDefault: Billing zip of the card charged for the donation

Field.Name: cardcode
Field.Caption: Card Code
Field.HelpDefault: CVV Code (three digits on the back) of the card charged for the donation

Field.Name: processorreference
Field.Caption: Reference Number
Field.HelpDefault: Reference number from the payment gateway for this transaction

Field.Name: processorresponse
Field.Caption: Processor Response
Field.HelpDefault: Response from the payment gateway for this transaction

Field.Name: memberid
Field.Caption: Member
Field.HelpDefault: The member record associated the the user who donated

Field.Name: visitid
Field.Caption: Visit
Field.HelpDefault: Visit ID of the user during the donation - informational purposes only
